relation: I'll be honest, it's pretty bad, but that shouldn't stop you from coming.

FANTASTIC, there are plenty of options for different types of living situations, from co-ed to single-sex, doubles, singles and triples, as well as some themed living (outdoor program and queer dorm).

At Evergreen you do exactly as much as you want to, there is definitely a minimum requirement but there is absolutely no maximum. The sky is always your limit, and all of the support you could possibly need will be offered.
Consider how you want to manage your future education and what amount of freedom and personal responsibility you want as you consider Evergreen.
Evergreen is a fantastic example of non-traditional education at its finest.
pageTitle: The Evergreen State College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 01/05/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 13 out of 13 people found this review useful. 1 of 32 Sarah from Haines, AK Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck Not the best deal for out-of-state students, if you're looking solely at price. Apply for school scholarships early, and get your FAFSA in on time. Evergreen opted out of the Western Undergraduate Exchange, claiming to be able to give students better financial aid independently. What to do for fun Evergreen has a wide variety of clubs and teams to choose from. The Student Activities Center also makes it easy to start a new club, all you need are four interested people. New clubs are given advice on planning and are able to request a budget. There's a lot of outdoor space and the recreational building is well-stocked. Olympia is an easy bus ride away, if you are looking for city activities. Food and Dining Could be better, could be worse. The baked goods are dangerously tasty and there are a lot of vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options. On the other hand, the food can be disappointing, and the required freshman dining plans are not economical. Dorm Life The Residence Assistants are helpful, and the rooms are pretty decent. Then again, there are usually loud people until around 2-4 am. There is a quiet dorm option. Academic
